co.poynt.os.services.v1

Interface IPoyntStayService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.IInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IPoyntStayService.Stub

    public interface IPoyntStayService
extends android.os.IInterface
    Provides necessary interfaces to create and manage Stays. All operations require network connectivity except for the 'get' operations, in which case, data from the local Poynt Stays content providerName is returned. Poynt Stay content providerName is updated whenever the stays are modified locally or on the cloud. All calls require the necessary permissions declared in the caller's Android Manifest file. Please refer to Poynt OS Permissions for more details.
    Since:
    1.0-beta2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPoyntStayService.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

      void getStay(String stayId, String requestId, IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)

    • Method Detail

      • createStay

        void createStay(co.poynt.api.model.Stay stay,
                String requestId,
                IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
         throws android.os.RemoteException
        Creates the stay in Poynt Cloud and also saves the created stay in Poynt Stay content providerName. This interface only creates the stay and does not process any payment transactions (if any) specified in the Stay object.
        Parameters:
        stay - co.poynt.api.Stay
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • processStay

        void processStay(co.poynt.api.model.Stay stay,
                 String requestId,
                 IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
          throws android.os.RemoteException
        Processes the given stay through Poynt Cloud and also saves the processed stay in local Poynt Stay content providerName. This interface processes any payment transactions specified in the Stay object.
        Parameters:
        stay - co.poynt.api.Stay
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • cancelStay

        void cancelStay(String stayId,
                String requestId,
                IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
         throws android.os.RemoteException
        Cancels the given stay through Poynt Cloud and also updates the stay in local Poynt Stay content providerName. This interface refunds or voids any transactions that are part of the original Stay.
        Parameters:
        stay - co.poynt.api.Stay
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • captureStay

        void captureStay(String stayId,
                 co.poynt.api.model.Stay stay,
                 String requestId,
                 IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
          throws android.os.RemoteException
        Captures the payment transactions associated with the given stay through Poynt Cloud and also updates the stay in local Poynt Stay content providerName. When partial payment captures are required, an stay object with the partial capture information can be passed as an argument. When only stayId is provided, the payments are captured completely.
        Parameters:
        stayId - ID of the stay to capture
        stay - co.poynt.api.Stay
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • completeStay

        void completeStay(String stayId,
                  co.poynt.api.model.Stay stay,
                  String requestId,
                  IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
           throws android.os.RemoteException
        Captures the payment transactions associated with the given stay and marks the oder as Completed. Stay is processed through Poynt Cloud and also updated in the local Poynt Stay content providerName. When partial payment captures are required, an stay object with the partial capture information can be passed as an argument. When only stayId is provided, the payments are captured completely.
        Parameters:
        stayId - ID of the stay to capture
        stay - co.poynt.api.Stay
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getStay

        void getStay(String stayId,
             String requestId,
             IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
      throws android.os.RemoteException
        Retrieves the given stay from the local Poynt Stay content providerName if available, otherwise fetches from the Poynt Cloud .
        Parameters:
        stayId - ID of the stay to retrieve
        requestId - RequestId for tracking the request
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • updateStay

        void updateStay(String stayId,
                co.poynt.api.model.Stay stay,
                String requestId,
                IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
         throws android.os.RemoteException
        Updates the given stay in the Poynt Cloud and updates local Poynt Stay content providerName.
        Parameters:
        stayId - ID of the stay to update
        stay - Stay
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getStayFromCloud

        void getStayFromCloud(String stayId,
                      String requestId,
                      IPoyntStayServiceListener callback)
               throws android.os.RemoteException
        Retrieves the given stay from the Poynt Cloud.
        Parameters:
        stayId - ID of the stay to retrieve
        requestId - RequestId for tracking the request
        callback - IPoyntStayServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
